description: Take your ham centrepiece to the next level with a burnt honey and orange glaze. With a side of sweet mustard pickle, your tastebuds will definitely go into overdrive.
keywords: Burnt Honey & Orange Glazed Quarter Ham
name: Burnt Honey & Orange Glazed Quarter Ham Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.5 kg Woolworths Gold triple smoked free range quarter leg ham

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer ham to a large serving platter. Serve with sweet mustard pickle and scattered with remaining thyme leaves.
